Name: Piozila
About the game: Piozila is a puzzle game similar to Sokoban, with a chubby chameleon and a lovely colorful graphics. Your goal is to help a small chameleon to escape by intelligently moving the chameleon and other objects. Solve puzzles, avoid fires and traps, and above all, beware of humans. The little chameleon is called Leon, it can change color. This little crybaby is a glutton, he likes to eat a lot and the more he moves, the hungrier he will be. So you should find the right way because he can starve. You will be able to move many objects such as a tree, a car, a bed, the toilet bowl and more. Mena mena games is a game development team based in Madagascar, in the South East region of Africa.
